EmailTemplate.name: AERO_GDPR_Data_Management_mih.AERO_Preference_Confirmation_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation - Communications Preference Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Your preference has been updated Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
You have successfully updated your marketing communications* preference from Honeywell International Inc., its affiliates, subsidiaries, third parties that distribute our products and other trusted business partners.
You’ll be receiving exclusive updates about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers and related topics on {{lead.Signup:default=no selections made}}.
Can’t wait? Check our website here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>. You can update your preferences here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> at any time.
Thank you,
Team Honeywell
*Marketing communications refers to communications about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers, and related topics via telephone, email, and other forms of electronic communication (e.g., communications through social media platforms).
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/hq0pk0I00Q0000GnZ020XI0]]>
